resources.string:
AnneFlix, a cutting-edge streaming app, offers an extensive range of functionalities to enhance user experience. Key features include: 
- Film and Series Categories: Explore a wide array of genres. 
- Films and Series Listings: Browse through an extensive collection, sorted by categories. 
- Movie and Series Details: Delve into detailed descriptions for each film and series. 
- Dashboard : Discover top rated, trending now, upcoming and favorite movies . 
- Trailers: Watch previews of films and series. 
- Favorites List: Easily mark your favorite movies and series, conveniently managed in a local database for quick access. 
- Comments: View and share thoughts and reviews on movies and series, enhancing community engagement. 
- Providers: View the list of platforms where you can watch a movie or series. 
- About View: This section offers a thorough overview of the app's functionalities, showcases the LinkedIn profiles of team members, and lists the libraries utilized in the development process. 
- Rating a movie: We have an issue with an unauthorized token; we are receiving a 401 error. We have posted screenshots of this on our Git board in the problem section.

Navigation Fragment: For efficient and intuitive app navigation.
 Hilt: Dependency Injection for streamlined and maintainable code.
 Moshi: JSON Serialization and Deserialization for seamless data handling.
 Retrofit: Consuming web services with ease and efficiency.
 Coil: Effective and memory-efficient image loading and display.
 DAllE : Generation of The Logo MBDS .
